item.title: Using grpc-gateway for JSON to gRPC transcoding
Writing a Ray Tracer in Go
item.description: Getting Started I recently decided to learn about 3D graphics programming. I knew absolutely nothing about how graphics worked before starting. I decided to learn about a particular graphics rendering technique called ray tracing. Shadows My sixth rendering is the same ray traced world as the last rendering but with shadows! The rendering demonstrates using shadow rays to determine if a point is in a shadow or not. If a point is in shadow, the ray tracer will omit the diffuse and specular contribution and only use the ambient contribution to shade the pixel.

item.title: About
item.description: About Me Hello ðŸ‘‹ I’m Austin Gebauer. I live in Seattle, WA. I’m a software engineer. I studied computer science at the University of Washington. I’m currently working on networking software for NGINX as a part of F5 Networks. This Blog This blog is an outlet for me to share things that I’ve learned with others. Most of my posts will answer questions similar to: How does X work?
